heliolib.data_performance_metrics package

Submodules

heliolib.data_performance_metrics.energy_yield module

class heliolib.data_performance_metrics.energy_yield.EnergyYield(input_data, array_info, power_key='P')[source]

Bases: object

Calculates instantaneous, daily, total and specific energy yield from power data and array information.

Attributes

input_data (pd.DataFrame): Input data containing power values with a DatetimeIndex. array_info (pd.DataFrame): Information about the solar array, including installed capacity. power_key (str): Column name of the power values in the input_data. Default is “P”.

Methods

  • calculate_instantaneous_energy_yield(): Get the instantaneous energy yield.

  • calculate_daily_energy_yield(): Get the daily energy yield.

  • calculate_total_energy_yield(): Get the total energy yield.

  • calculate_specific_energy_yield(): Get the specific energy yield.

calculate_daily_energy_yield()[source]

Get the daily energy yield.

Returns

pd.Series: A Series containing the daily energy yield.

calculate_instantaneous_energy_yield()[source]

Calculate instantaneous energy yield.

Returns

pd.Series: A Series containing the calculated instantaneous energy yield.

calculate_specific_energy_yield()[source]

Get the specific energy yield.

Returns

pd.Series: A Series containing the specific energy yield.

calculate_total_energy_yield()[source]

Get the total energy yield.

Returns

pd.Series: A Series containing the total energy yield.

heliolib.data_performance_metrics.performance_ratio module

class heliolib.data_performance_metrics.performance_ratio.PerformanceRatio(power_key='P', irradiance_key='G', expected_power_key='P_exp_noct_degradation')[source]

Bases: object

Calculate Performance Ratio (PR) for solar power generation data.

Performance Ratio is a measure of how effectively a solar power system is converting sunlight into electricity. This class calculates PR based on input data containing irradiance, actual power, and expected power.

Methods

  • performance_ratio_nrel(input_data): Calculate daily Performance Ratio.

performance_ratio_nrel(input_data)[source]

Calculate daily Performance Ratio (PR) based on input data.

PR is calculated as the ratio of actual power to expected power for each day in the input data.

Parameters

input_data (pd.DataFrame): Input data containing irradiance, actual power, and expected power.

Returns

pd.Series: A pandas Series containing daily Performance Ratio values.
